TrustedTypePolicyFactoryIsScript.summary: The isScript() method of the interface returns true if it is passed a valid object.

blockquote.para: Note: The purpose of the functions isScript(), , and is to check if the object is a valid TrustedType object, created by a configured policy.

TrustedTypePolicyFactoryIsScript.returns: A {{jsxref("boolean")}} that is true if the object is a valid object.
